cn.description:
这是一款革新式的Roguelite游戏：
◆“卡牌构筑×战棋”深度融合的独特玩法。
◆独创的多牌同出玩法带来新鲜体验。

作为硬核向的策略游戏，《魔卡棋旅》有：
◆ 随机生成的战斗场景和地图节点，带来了丰富的战斗体验。
◆ 六个独特的职业，每个职业的构筑玩法都是独一无二的。
◆ 300+张卡牌和100+种秘宝与道具，每一局游戏都是全新的惊奇冒险！
◆ 多周目层层递进的难度挑战。
◆ 碎片化进程保存技术，随时随地玩几下或是持续玩够一局90分钟的冒险全都可以！

cn.trackName: 打造世界-经典沙盒建造
cn.sellerName: Xiamen Kuaibaoyou Network Technology Co., Ltd
cn.releaseNotes: 《打造世界》iOS端云存档功能上线——存档一键上传，丢档不再！
cn.description:
《打造世界》结合了策略、方块建造沙盒以及塔防多种元素。游戏中，你不是一个人在战斗，需要带领矮人部落在这个充满危险生物的随机世界里进行探索，安排他们分工合作收集资源，制作需要的物品、武器和盔甲，以及建造城堡，来抵御危险生物的入侵。

【世界探索、沙盒生存】
游戏共有七个不同的世界（游戏本体4个地图+3个dlc地图），每个世界都是随机生成的岛屿，你可以在游戏中自由的改变地形地貌。不同世界有着各自的地理及生物特色，同时也暗藏各类怪物和BOSS。带上大聪明矮人征服各个世界吧！

【资源采集、制作发展】
游戏中挖掘矿藏、捕捉动物、打败敌人、种植农田等等方式获得原料；升级科技树，制作数百种完全不同的物品！要知道除了常规的武器、建筑材料、食物、炼金药水外，你甚至建造一个广大的矿井网，配上升降机和铁路，快速抵达藏有最珍贵金属的矿脉中。如何发展矮人部落，你可要好好思考一下。
对了，必须得告诉你，游戏中存在各种魔法，比如打开传送门，提高矮人运输资源的效率；使用魔法之光照亮黑暗的洞穴吓跑怪物；使用降水或是魔法森林加快树木成长，或者是使用指南针魔法找到隐藏资源，从而帮助加快资源开采，探索世界。

【自由建造、殖民管理】
发展一个部落可没那么容易，你需要安排矮人们的衣食住行，可以直接控制矮人进行挖掘、砍伐、攻击、建造等操作，并在矮人与怪物和BOSS战斗时使用魔法帮助他们。
在游戏刚开始时，你只有1位矮人，随着在这个世界的等级提升，会获得更多的矮人；而随着人数越来越多，部落规模也越来越大的。
部落的发展，建筑是必不可少的，发挥你天马星空的想象吧，无论是建古代宫殿风格、还是想要征服天空的空中住宅、又或者是结合现代科技坚不可摧的堡垒，只要你脑洞够大，创造独属于你的矮人之家！

【即时战略&塔防战斗】
有些怪物会成群结队的来掠夺矮人资源，有些怪物会定期从传送门而来攻打矮人，你需要带领矮人建立攻防系统，在的堡垒周围的路上设满陷阱和导弹塔，抵抗成群结队入侵而来的敌人。

【DLC拓展内容】
丰富的DLC内容拓展既可以带你领略不一样的世界：融合中式风格元素的《龙之神庙》、家园领地保卫战的《孤山世界》、暗黑领主和矮人的终极决战《邪恶之心》，还可以让你在世界探索中增加更多乐趣：女矮人携宠物及新装备登场的《姐妹连》、在神秘的斯芬克斯的沙漠世界探索神庙的《废弃矿山》、充满了植物和古老的魔法的《贪婪洞窟》，召唤英雄战士和法师的《英雄对决》，对抗更加强大的地下深渊头目的《怪物联盟》。

【联系我们】

cn.description:
《TA》自上线以来，已成功配对了几十万对！他们从最开始的相遇，再慢慢相恋。

很多人找不到对象的真正原因是缺乏认识异性的途径，《TA》正是一条认识异性的好途径。

《TA》会根据年龄、学历、兴趣爱好等维度进行配对，把最合适两人配成一对，再进行一对一聊天。

每个APP都有一个定位，《TA》的定位是【靠谱】。如果你想找到男朋友、女朋友、结婚对象，那欢迎你。

cn.description:
Apple 的年度应用在全球范围内下载次数超过 1500 万次，获得 20 万个 5 星级评分，Day One 重塑了日记功能，让您可以随时记录日常生活。 在全球最值得信赖的数字日记中安全地保存音频、视频、照片、笔记等内容。

“Day One 创造了一个非常罕见，甚至让人感觉神圣的东西：一个完全私人的数字空间。”-《纽约时报》

“Day One 使写日记变成了一件轻松愉快的事。”- Wired

“这款出色的日记应用程序仍然美观、易于使用，并且对于任何竞争对手来说都是一个难以超越的强大产品。”- Macworld

为什么选择 DAY ONE？

Day One 是一款原创日记应用。经过十年不懈的更新和新增功能，使它成为世界上最私密、最值得信任和最易于使用的日记记录平台。

易于使用，让您爱不释手

• 备受赞誉的美观设计
• 无限的文本日记条目
• 无限量照片和视频*
•功能强大的富文本格式，带有 Markdown 功能
• 不同的日记类型适用于记录您生活的方方面面*

私密且安全

• 自动备份可确保日记条目的安全性
• 端到端加密，这是一种确保日记条目完全私密的巧妙方式
•日记条目使用密码或 TouchID 来保证安全性
•多个导出选项（pdf、纯文本、JSON 等）确保您的日记条目永远属于您

养成习惯并坚持下去

•可编程的提醒通知
• 独特的每日日记提示功能有助于避免日记中断
•可自定义的模板可节省时间，并可向日记条目中添加组织
• 通过今日视图，您可以大致了解您去过哪里，做了什么

随时随地写日记

• 可在 iPhone、Apple Watch、iPad 和 Mac 上使用的跨平台应用
• 能够直接向您的日记发送文本或电子邮件条目

专为记录回忆而生

• 那年今日功能让您可以回顾过去的回忆
• 标签、收藏夹和搜索筛选器使您可以轻松找到所需内容
• 地图视图可快速显示您在日记中记录的所有地点

*Day One 可永久免费使用，不限日记条目数量。 Day One 高级会员可享受其他功能，包括不限量的照片、视频和音频录制。 立即开始免费试用。

隐私政策：https://dayoneapp.com/privacy-policy/

使用条款：https://dayoneapp.com/terms-of-use/

hk.releaseNotes:
• Option to enable video stabilization.
• 8mm Pro subscribers: import LUT files(cube & 3dl) to create your own filters!
hk.description:
8mm is so realistic it was even used to film scenes in the Oscar-winning documentary Searching for Sugar Man!

We have established the de facto standard of real-time retro film emulation. It was featured by Apple in App of the Day, App of the Week, In the Director's Chair, App Store Essentials, etc.

8mm Vintage Camera captures the beauty and magic of old-school vintage movies right through your viewfinder. Dust and scratches, retro colors, flickering, light leaks, and even frame shake, all can be instantly added with a single tap of the finger.

SHOOT BOTH PHOTOS AND VIDEOS WITH SOPHISTICATED LIVE EFFECTS

• Combine effects of film color, halation, dust & scratch, film grain, and softening to create authentic old-school movies
• Adjust the strength of the effects to achieve your own unique visual style
• 10 Lenses (frame) effects: Projector, Vignetting, Light Leak, Color Fringing, Super 8, Screen, 16mm, Tube, color negatives of Super 8 and 16mm
• 21 Retro & Aged Films: 1920, Noir, 60s, 70s, Sakura, XPro, Siena, Pela, Indigo, Tuscan, Two-Color, 2-Strip, 3X, and monochromes
• Additional 21 filters that emulate real historical films and expired films - available with the 8mm Pro subscription
• Jitter Button to imitate real 8mm projectors frame shakes
• Sound Switch to add projector sound for extra authenticity or mute the video for a silent movie effect.
• Up to 4K 30fps with original unfiltered video recording on newer devices

A COMPACT EDITOR FOR MOVIE CREATION

- Apply film and frame effects to clips
- Trim video, pan & zoom photo
- Add a soundtrack from your music library
- Choose from 5 unique themes with matching titles, transitions

8MM PRO SUBSCRIPTION

- You can subscribe or make a one-time purchase for unlimited access to all current filters and future updates
- Start your subscription with a free 7-day trial. Once the trial is over, you’ll be charged an annual subscription fee
- Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can go to your Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions to turn auto-renew off

hk.description:

獲獎：

關於此遊戲：
《地城謎蹤》是一款考驗玩家 2D 空間邏輯和技能運用的解謎遊戲，你可以用劍打倒身旁的怪物、用弓箭攻擊遠處的敵人、用盾牌推動障礙物、甚至可以用手套拉動怪物改變他的位置。

此遊戲總共有 150 個精心設計的關卡，玩家必須要充分了解遊戲的機制才能順利過關。

而若要達成進階目標，則需要針對解法進行最佳化，有的時候甚至要拋棄原本的解法，重新以不同角度去觀察和思考才能達成。

● 地城+解謎+倉庫番
● 150 個精心設計的關卡
● 地城氛圍的像素美術
● 非線性地城地圖

hk.description:
領導壯大中的德國軍隊東進或投身蘇維埃保衛祖國俄羅斯。在FROZEN FRONT中化身一位聰穎的指揮官，正確選擇戰爭策略，獲得更高的軍銜。

感受令人震撼的二戰場景，盡在HandyGames™的全新模擬類軍事策略遊戲！

任務簡報

在1941年東部戰線的刺骨嚴寒中戰鬥！
指揮坦克和步兵 攻克敵陣！
派重型轟炸機 炸平敵軍指揮部！
在惡劣地形中佈置你的炮兵部隊！
為部隊提供物資和彈藥！
抵禦人數遠超自身的敵人！

- 去除廣告！
- 二戰題材的回合制策略遊戲
- 激動人心的戰役和充滿挑戰的任務
- 白熱化的多人戰鬥
- 經典的德國 和蘇聯部隊
- 戰鬥中可修理，偽裝，構築各種人員和建物
- 雙方擁有步兵，炮兵，坦克和空軍
- 六角網格可一覽無餘
- 細膩的圖片和極為真實的聲效

hk.trackName: Lanota - 動感節奏音樂遊戲
hk.description:
用悠揚樂聲拯救世界，全新體驗的繪本風角色扮演音樂遊戲！
扮演主角探索地圖，以音樂遊戲進行「調律」，讓黑白無聲的世界恢復生機。
隨著劇情演進，逐步解鎖遊玩多樣風格的樂曲，享受令人震撼的boss關卡演出，與欣賞精美的繪本故事！

《獎項與成就》

2016 國際行動遊戲大獎 1st IMGA SEA「最佳音樂音效獎 Excellence in Audio」
2016 GAME STAR遊戲之星票選Taiwan Indie Game項目金獎
2017 台北國際電玩展 獨立遊戲獎 Indie Game Award 「最佳音樂音效獎 Best Audio」
2017 13th IMGA Global 入圍
2017 Indie Prize Award in Casual Connect Asia 「最佳行動遊戲 Best Mobile Game」 入圍

《遊戲特色》

>> 新穎動感的音樂遊戲

獨創多變的盤面動畫，隨著音樂節奏點擊滑動，遊玩數十位作曲家創作的高品質樂曲，和觀看魄力十足的boss關卡特別演出。我們為音樂遊戲的初學者到專業玩家分別打造適合的難易度與挑戰課題，鍛鍊自己的實力同時解鎖隱藏要素吧！

>> 精緻迷人的繪本故事

「我相信，受音律眷顧的你一定可以恢復世界原本的秩序。」
當各地點的紊亂能量藉由「調律」恢復秩序，世界原本的姿態也逐漸展現在眼前。在地圖上逐步探索未知的地點，欣賞豐富故事文本與精心繪製的繪本插畫，途中發現的道具就像是旅行的紀念品。

>> 排行榜、成就、成績分享與存檔

收集劇情相關的任務成就，向好友分享成績結算畫面，並在排行榜上與全世界音樂遊戲好手競爭。遊戲支援雲端存檔。

《官方連結》

官方網站：http://noxygames.com/lanota/
隱私權政策與服務條款：https://noxygames.com/lanota/privacy.html

在Facebook追蹤我們：https://www.facebook.com/lanota/
Twitter: @Noxy_Lanota  /  @Noxy_Lanota_EN
Discord: https://discord.gg/lanota

hk.description:
在期盼已久的 「  Clouds & Sheep 」遊戲續集中，可愛的羊羣終於再次得以解放！完成無數任務，滿足綿羊朋友的需求。種植花草樹木並剪不同顏色的羊毛來採購資源！收集快樂星星，收割木材和花瓣，並用它們來爲羊羣提供食物、飾品、玩具和其他東西！控制雲朵，及時降雨，確保綿羊永遠都不會缺飲用水。如果你的綿羊感到高興且滿足，牠們就會生下小羔羊！

每只動物都需要你的關注！這些滾圓的綿羊喜歡休閒娛樂！讓你的綿羊跳躍起來，並使用蹦牀、蹺蹺板和鞦韆主動和牠們一起玩耍！旁觀你的寵物們互相交流，給牠們一些物品，然後觀察牠們的反應！使用有趣的物品自定義你的羊羣牧場，並從狂野西域和海盜領域等不同設定中進行選擇。旁觀你的羊羣白天不知疲憊地奔跑，而到了晚上就依着溫暖的篝火而眠。儘可能讓綿羊保持心情愉快、身體健康，防牠們變成天空中綿狀的大雲朵。

特色：
- 去除廣告！
- 一流遊戲「  Clouds & Sheep 」的精彩續集
- 踏上史詩般的探險之路，找到傳奇般的青春泉水！
- 擁有可愛綿羊的模擬遊戲
- 照顧好羊羣
- 飼養甜美的小羔羊
- 積極和羊羣玩耍
- 給牠們提供許多不同的物品
- 種植並收割不同的資源
- 剪羊毛
- 自定義農場
- 控制天氣
- 日夜循環
- 3D 世界中的開放式遊戲設定
- 適合兒童，但全家人一起玩也非常有趣
- 支持MFi遊戲手柄
- 支持Game Center

感謝您選擇 'Clouds & Sheep 2'！您可以查看最新消息，隨時期待您的意見：

hk.description:
Track calories, food, and macros with ease! MyNetDiary has a free barcode scanner, personal diet plans, and AI Meal Scan for instant logging — all in a smart, simple-to-use app. 

USERS SAY…

The best
Love this app! The best out of many food tracking apps that I have tried over the years. Love that it is free! The breakdown of the meal and daily nutrition is very informative. Try it you will love it!

LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS APP
Best app for tracking food, exercise! Consistently losing weight! I love how it shows you if you're on target for your goal. Great layout, great look, easy to use!!! I highly recommend this app if you're looking to be a healthier you!!!

Fast, intuitive, user friendly
I have tried other calorie tracking programs over the years and this app is by far the best I've come across. I highly recommend it. The free version is very good and I am now enjoying the extra functions through a paid subscription.

RECOGNIZED EXCELLENCE
• Ranked #1 in Forbes Health’s Best Weight Loss Apps of 2025.
• Rated #1 by the American Journal of Preventive Medicine.
• Praised by The New York Times as “simpler, quicker, and better-looking” than other apps.
• Featured in Today’s Dietitian, alongside WW and Noom.

DIFFERENT FROM OTHER DIET APPS
• Simple & Generous Features: Packed with free tools, no ads.
• Lightning-Fast Logging: Barcode scanner and AI Meal Scan make tracking effortless.
• Verified Food Database: Over 1.7 million items with 108 nutrients for accuracy.
• Privacy Focused: No account required.

MyNetDiary puts you in control. You can pick a diet or a meal plan, follow our registered dietitians' easy tips, and follow the app's guidance. Or, you can turn them off and simply use MyNetDiary as the best free calorie-counting app in the world.

PROVEN SUCCESS
• Active members lose an average of 1.4 lbs/week
• Over 25 million users have chosen MyNetDiary, many switched from other diet apps

A few of the free version features:
• Easy food, exercise, and water tracking.
• Daily coaching tips and meal reminders.
• Customizable dashboard for your goals.
• iOS Health integration and Apple Watch support.
• Shopping lists, nutrition articles, and how-to videos.

SPECIAL PRO APP FEATURES
• Up to 108 nutrients tracked
• Plan macros
• Full set of charts
• Timestamps
• Carb tracking

If you need more support, MyNetDiary Premium provides all the guidance and features you may need. At your fingertips, you'll find:

• Premium Diets, 600+ full-flavored Premium Recipes and Menus by RDs, including low-carb, keto, high-protein, Mediterranean, vegetarian, and more - with diet planners, guides, and feedback.
• Intermittent fasting - full-featured, with fasting timer and different protocols.
• Macros planning and cycling.
• Planning and tracking up to 108 nutrients, including omegas and aminos.
• Recipe import tool - easily load internet recipes and calculate complete nutrition.
• Integrations with top fitness trackers - Fitbit, Garmin, and Withings.
• In-depth reporting and analysis tools to improve your diet.

hk.description:
Build airplanes by snapping parts together, designing wing sections, and attaching engines. At any time, you can strap yourself into the cockpit and see how it flies with realistic physics. If you're not in the mood for building, over 250,000 airplanes are available to download for free.

BUILD AIRPLANES
You have the tools you'll need to bring any airplane to life. Snap parts together to build your airplane's body. Place engines to add thrust. Design and attach wings and then strap yourself into the cockpit and see how it flies. 

DOWNLOAD AIRPLANES
Over 250,000 airplanes are available to download for free from SimplePlanes.com. Find anything from old WW2 bombers to next-generation fighters to sci-fi spacecraft. You can upload your own airplanes and rise through the ranks from a bronze builder to a gold level builder.

DYNAMIC FLIGHT MODEL
Flight simulation at its finest. Every little change you make in the designer impacts how the airplane flies. Weight distribution, thrust, lift, and drag are all calculated continuously while flying. Parts can break off in spectacular fashion while flying due to over-stress or by hitting something. The fun won't stop there though. You can keep on flying even with a missing wing if you've got the skills.

SANDBOX MODE
Use all available parts to build airplanes with no restrictions. The sky is the limit. Literally.

CHALLENGES
Climb into the cockpit of one of your custom aircraft and see how it does in the challenges. Land on aircraft carriers, dodge surface-to-air missiles, race through courses, and so much more.

EDUCATIONAL
Tutorials will help players learn the basics of real airplane design and the considerations that need to be taken when airplanes are made.

In this exciting mobile game, you will become a legendary agent and embark on a secret operation codenamed "zero". Your mission is to sneak into the enemy's aircraft base and destroy all enemy aircraft. You will face many threats alone, but fortunately, you have a support aircraft to provide you with airdrop supplies.

The gameplay of the game is simple but challenging. You will control the agent to move left and right on the runway of the aircraft base to avoid the attacks of enemy aircraft and the falling missiles. The top of the screen is the flight area of ​​​​the enemy aircraft, and they will continue to fire missiles at you in an attempt to shoot you down. You need to stay alert at all times to avoid these deadly threats.

By clicking on the screen, you can fire into the sky and destroy enemy aircraft. There is also a "continuous shooting mode" in the game. After turning it on, you can continue to fire into the air and eliminate the enemy more efficiently. But be careful, once the enemy's missiles fall to the ground, they will cause great damage to you. You only have 3 chances to be hit. Once this number is exceeded, the game will end.

During the battle, the support aircraft will regularly drop airdrops for you. These airdrops contain a variety of useful props, such as ammunition boxes for replenishing bullets, medical kits for restoring health, and upgrade props for strengthening missiles. Proper use of these airdrop props will help you gain an advantage in battle.

As the game progresses, as long as you can hold on longer, you will get additional upgrade opportunities. Every upgrade will make you stronger, whether it is improving firepower, increasing health, or unlocking more powerful props, which can make you more confident when facing the enemy. The longer you hold on, the greater the benefits you will get. The ultimate goal is to defend yourself for as long as possible and destroy more enemy aircraft.

This is a mini casual game that can start an exciting agent journey anytime, anywhere. Simple and easy-to-use operations, coupled with challenging gameplay, allow you to experience the thrill of exciting battles in fragmented time.

In a desolate wilderness, the atmosphere is tense. You are standing in an open area, and suddenly, a group of ferocious wolves surround you from all directions. Their eyes are flashing with greed, and they are approaching you step by step. At this critical moment, you must pick up the gun in your hand, react quickly, repel these monsters, and protect your life. This is a tense and exciting battle, and also a simple and relaxing casual mini game.

### Gameplay

#### Click the screen to fire
The operation of the game is very simple. You only need to click the screen to control the character to shoot at the monster. The crosshairs on the screen will automatically aim at the approaching wolf. You only need to click the screen at the right time to fire bullets and repel the monster. This simple and intuitive operation method allows players to easily get started and quickly get into the game without complicated tutorials.

#### Dynamic aiming and reaction
Although the operation of the game is simple, the actions of the monsters are full of uncertainty. The wolves will attack you from different directions and angles. You need to stay alert at all times, react quickly, and click the screen accurately to effectively repel them. As the game progresses, the number of monsters will gradually increase, and their actions will become more cunning and rapid, which requires players to constantly improve their reaction speed and aiming accuracy.

#### Easy restart, continuous challenge
The game has a very fast pace. Once surrounded or hit by monsters, the game will end. But don't worry, the game provides an easy restart mechanism. You can restart the game with just a click and get back into this exciting battle. This fast restart mechanism allows players to try multiple times in a short period of time, constantly challenge their limits, and easily get the joy of the game.

#### Unique and interesting painting style
The game uses a unique art style. Although the picture is simple, it is full of fun and tension. The image design of the monsters is both scary and interesting, allowing players to feel a hint of humor in the tense battle. The scene design of the game is also very rich. From the barren wilderness to the abandoned town, each scene has its own unique atmosphere, making players feel as if they are in a real combat environment.

#### Endless challenges and fun
Every game is a new challenge. The action mode and number of monsters will be different, which requires players to constantly adjust their strategies and reactions. As the game progresses, you can also unlock new weapons and props to improve your combat effectiveness and better deal with more powerful monsters. This endless challenge and constantly improving gameplay allows players to immerse themselves in the game for a long time and enjoy the fun of shooting.

In this exciting battle, you will be surrounded by various monsters, but with your courage and wisdom, you will be able to repel them and win. Come join this battle, experience simple and easy gameplay, and enjoy endless challenges and fun!

You will become a brave guardian and embark on an adventure to a shrine surrounded by monsters to help the Onmyoji dispel evil and liberate the trapped monster girl.

The game adopts the classic horizontal version of the game. The character you control holds a weapon and stands in the center of the screen, advancing through the various scenes of the shrine as you operate. The road ahead is full of monsters that are malicious to you. They are lurking in the shadows or flying in the air, ready to attack you at any time. You need to keep firing bullets to repel these monsters and protect your way forward.

In the process of moving forward, you can collect gold coins and various props floating in the air by controlling the character to jump upwards. Gold coins are an important resource in the game, which can be used to unlock more powerful weapons and upgrade your equipment. Props can provide you with immediate help, such as increasing the number of bullets, increasing the power of weapons, and obtaining a short invincible state. Reasonable use of these props will make you more calm when facing powerful monsters.

As you continue to defeat monsters, the distance you travel will become longer and longer, and every corner of the shrine will be gradually liberated by you. Each level has a different scene setting, from the ancient shrine courtyard to the deep woods, to the mysterious basement, each scene has unique monsters and challenges waiting for you. You need to flexibly control the character, dodge the monster's attacks, and accurately fire bullets to eliminate the enemy.

hk.description:
MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY

BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY
Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success.

ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM
Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination.

REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS
Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars.

UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK
Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry.

DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE
Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey.

YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE
Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you.

SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY
It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

扮演主角探索地圖，以音樂遊戲進行「調律」，讓黑白無聲的世界恢復生機。
隨著劇情演進，逐步解鎖遊玩多樣風格的樂曲，享受令人震撼的boss關卡演出，與欣賞精美的繪本故事！

《獎項與成就》

2016 國際行動遊戲大獎 1st IMGA SEA「最佳音樂音效獎 Excellence in Audio」
2016 GAME STAR遊戲之星票選Taiwan Indie Game項目金獎
2017 台北國際電玩展 獨立遊戲獎 Indie Game Award 「最佳音樂音效獎 Best Audio」
2017 13th IMGA Global 入圍
2017 Indie Prize Award in Casual Connect Asia 「最佳行動遊戲 Best Mobile Game」 入圍

《遊戲特色》

>> 新穎動感的音樂遊戲

獨創多變的盤面動畫，隨著音樂節奏點擊滑動，遊玩數十位作曲家創作的高品質樂曲，和觀看魄力十足的boss關卡特別演出。我們為音樂遊戲的初學者到專業玩家分別打造適合的難易度與挑戰課題，鍛鍊自己的實力同時解鎖隱藏要素吧！

>> 精緻迷人的繪本故事

「我相信，受音律眷顧的你一定可以恢復世界原本的秩序。」
當各地點的紊亂能量藉由「調律」恢復秩序，世界原本的姿態也逐漸展現在眼前。在地圖上逐步探索未知的地點，欣賞豐富故事文本與精心繪製的繪本插畫，途中發現的道具就像是旅行的紀念品。

>> 排行榜、成就、成績分享與存檔

收集劇情相關的任務成就，向好友分享成績結算畫面，並在排行榜上與全世界音樂遊戲好手競爭。遊戲支援雲端存檔。

《官方連結》

隱私權政策與服務條款：https://noxygames.com/lanota/privacy.html

在Facebook追蹤我們：https://www.facebook.com/lanota/
Twitter: @Noxy_Lanota  /  @Noxy_Lanota_EN
Discord: https://discord.gg/lanota

mo.description:
在期盼已久的 「  Clouds & Sheep 」遊戲續集中，可愛的羊羣終於再次得以解放！完成無數任務，滿足綿羊朋友的需求。種植花草樹木並剪不同顏色的羊毛來採購資源！收集快樂星星，收割木材和花瓣，並用它們來爲羊羣提供食物、飾品、玩具和其他東西！控制雲朵，及時降雨，確保綿羊永遠都不會缺飲用水。如果你的綿羊感到高興且滿足，牠們就會生下小羔羊！

每只動物都需要你的關注！這些滾圓的綿羊喜歡休閒娛樂！讓你的綿羊跳躍起來，並使用蹦牀、蹺蹺板和鞦韆主動和牠們一起玩耍！旁觀你的寵物們互相交流，給牠們一些物品，然後觀察牠們的反應！使用有趣的物品自定義你的羊羣牧場，並從狂野西域和海盜領域等不同設定中進行選擇。旁觀你的羊羣白天不知疲憊地奔跑，而到了晚上就依着溫暖的篝火而眠。儘可能讓綿羊保持心情愉快、身體健康，防牠們變成天空中綿狀的大雲朵。

特色：
- 去除廣告！
- 一流遊戲「  Clouds & Sheep 」的精彩續集
- 踏上史詩般的探險之路，找到傳奇般的青春泉水！
- 擁有可愛綿羊的模擬遊戲
- 照顧好羊羣
- 飼養甜美的小羔羊
- 積極和羊羣玩耍
- 給牠們提供許多不同的物品
- 種植並收割不同的資源
- 剪羊毛
- 自定義農場
- 控制天氣
- 日夜循環
- 3D 世界中的開放式遊戲設定
- 適合兒童，但全家人一起玩也非常有趣
- 支持MFi遊戲手柄
- 支持Game Center

mo.description:
將自己小村莊建成一個恢宏的中世紀帝國，打造繁榮的經濟和幸福的居民！尋覓採礦點，收割農作物，向國民徵收稅幣。營建角鬥場、酒館、市場，並用精美的雕塑、壯麗的紀念碑以及蔥郁的花園美化自己的城市。但是，仍然危機四伏。強盜在附近出沒，尋機掠奪和打劫您的和平城鎮。營建兵營，招募勇敢的士兵，建造守衛塔，保護你的鎮民免受傷害。從自己的城堡統治整個帝國，確保臣民歡樂幸福！

特色
- 去除廣告！
- 中世紀的各種城市營建方式
- 聰明的居民忙碌於日常事務
- 複雜經濟模擬，深度生產鏈
- 數十種不同的城鎮和生產建物
- 軍事功能可選，可訓練士兵，智鬥強盜
- 季節、天氣，都有意義，都有效果
- 火災、疫病、乾旱及更多毀滅性災難
- 豐富多樣的情景和挑戰任務
- 無限制的沙盒遊戲模式
- 支持Game Center

召集傳說英雄，挑戰無盡關卡！
自動戰鬥、採礦、強化通通都有！
真正的放置型奇幻 RPG，即使離線也能持續成長！

* 組建擁有獨特技能的英雄戰隊，發揮戰略優勢！

* 利用礦坑系統收集資源！打造裝備所需的一切盡在其中！

* 挑戰強大的首領，獲得傳說級獎勵！

* 自動成長系統，讓忙碌的你也能輕鬆遊玩！

* 多樣化內容：地城、遺物、進化、傳說裝備等你來體驗！

立即下載，開始書寫屬於你的傳奇！
馬上開始遊戲，收集你的英雄吧！

* Added 3 new lever variants
* Many more tweaks and bug fixes. More info here:
https://www.simpleplanes.com/Blog/View/1829113/v1-12-200-beta-is-now-available
mo.description:
Build airplanes by snapping parts together, designing wing sections, and attaching engines. At any time, you can strap yourself into the cockpit and see how it flies with realistic physics. If you're not in the mood for building, over 250,000 airplanes are available to download for free.

BUILD AIRPLANES
You have the tools you'll need to bring any airplane to life. Snap parts together to build your airplane's body. Place engines to add thrust. Design and attach wings and then strap yourself into the cockpit and see how it flies. 

DOWNLOAD AIRPLANES
Over 250,000 airplanes are available to download for free from SimplePlanes.com. Find anything from old WW2 bombers to next-generation fighters to sci-fi spacecraft. You can upload your own airplanes and rise through the ranks from a bronze builder to a gold level builder.

DYNAMIC FLIGHT MODEL
Flight simulation at its finest. Every little change you make in the designer impacts how the airplane flies. Weight distribution, thrust, lift, and drag are all calculated continuously while flying. Parts can break off in spectacular fashion while flying due to over-stress or by hitting something. The fun won't stop there though. You can keep on flying even with a missing wing if you've got the skills.

SANDBOX MODE
Use all available parts to build airplanes with no restrictions. The sky is the limit. Literally.

CHALLENGES
Climb into the cockpit of one of your custom aircraft and see how it does in the challenges. Land on aircraft carriers, dodge surface-to-air missiles, race through courses, and so much more.

EDUCATIONAL
Tutorials will help players learn the basics of real airplane design and the considerations that need to be taken when airplanes are made.

tw.description:
--

獲獎：
● 日本 2021 BitSummit THE 8th BIT | 官方入選
● 韓國 2020 釜山獨立遊戲節 (BIC Fest) | 最佳休閒獎
● 台灣 2020 巴哈姆特 ACG 創作大賽 | 銅賞

關於此遊戲：
《地城謎蹤》是一款考驗玩家 2D 空間邏輯和技能運用的解謎遊戲，你可以用劍打倒身旁的怪物、用弓箭攻擊遠處的敵人、用盾牌推動障礙物、甚至可以用手套拉動怪物改變他的位置。

此遊戲總共有 150 個精心設計的關卡，玩家必須要充分了解遊戲的機制才能順利過關。

而若要達成進階目標，則需要針對解法進行最佳化，有的時候甚至要拋棄原本的解法，重新以不同角度去觀察和思考才能達成。

遊戲特色：
● 地城+解謎+倉庫番
● 150 個精心設計的關卡
● 地城氛圍的像素美術
● 非線性地城地圖

--

● 在 Twitter 上追蹤我們
https://twitter.com/nekolyst
● 在 Facebook 上幫我們點讚
https://www.facebook.com/Nekolyst
● 加入我們的 Discord 群組
https://discord.gg/A7Sss9d

tw.description:
領導壯大中的德國軍隊東進或投身蘇維埃保衛祖國俄羅斯。在FROZEN FRONT中化身一位聰穎的指揮官，正確選擇戰爭策略，獲得更高的軍銜。

感受令人震撼的二戰場景，盡在HandyGames™的全新模擬類軍事策略遊戲！

任務簡報

在1941年東部戰線的刺骨嚴寒中戰鬥！
指揮坦克和步兵 攻克敵陣！
派重型轟炸機 炸平敵軍指揮部！
在惡劣地形中佈置你的炮兵部隊！
為部隊提供物資和彈藥！
抵禦人數遠超自身的敵人！

- 去除廣告！
- 二戰題材的回合制策略遊戲
- 激動人心的戰役和充滿挑戰的任務
- 白熱化的多人戰鬥
- 經典的德國 和蘇聯部隊
- 戰鬥中可修理，偽裝，構築各種人員和建物
- 雙方擁有步兵，炮兵，坦克和空軍
- 六角網格可一覽無餘
- 細膩的圖片和極為真實的聲效

感謝您選擇1941 Frozen Front！

tw.description:
將自己小村莊建成一個恢宏的中世紀帝國，打造繁榮的經濟和幸福的居民！尋覓採礦點，收割農作物，向國民徵收稅幣。營建角鬥場、酒館、市場，並用精美的雕塑、壯麗的紀念碑以及蔥郁的花園美化自己的城市。但是，仍然危機四伏。強盜在附近出沒，尋機掠奪和打劫您的和平城鎮。營建兵營，招募勇敢的士兵，建造守衛塔，保護你的鎮民免受傷害。從自己的城堡統治整個帝國，確保臣民歡樂幸福！

特色
- 去除廣告！
- 中世紀的各種城市營建方式
- 聰明的居民忙碌於日常事務
- 複雜經濟模擬，深度生產鏈
- 數十種不同的城鎮和生產建物
- 軍事功能可選，可訓練士兵，智鬥強盜
- 季節、天氣，都有意義，都有效果
- 火災、疫病、乾旱及更多毀滅性災難
- 豐富多樣的情景和挑戰任務
- 無限制的沙盒遊戲模式
- 支持Game Center

tw.description:
Build airplanes by snapping parts together, designing wing sections, and attaching engines. At any time, you can strap yourself into the cockpit and see how it flies with realistic physics. If you're not in the mood for building, over 250,000 airplanes are available to download for free.

BUILD AIRPLANES
You have the tools you'll need to bring any airplane to life. Snap parts together to build your airplane's body. Place engines to add thrust. Design and attach wings and then strap yourself into the cockpit and see how it flies. 

DOWNLOAD AIRPLANES
Over 250,000 airplanes are available to download for free from SimplePlanes.com. Find anything from old WW2 bombers to next-generation fighters to sci-fi spacecraft. You can upload your own airplanes and rise through the ranks from a bronze builder to a gold level builder.

DYNAMIC FLIGHT MODEL
Flight simulation at its finest. Every little change you make in the designer impacts how the airplane flies. Weight distribution, thrust, lift, and drag are all calculated continuously while flying. Parts can break off in spectacular fashion while flying due to over-stress or by hitting something. The fun won't stop there though. You can keep on flying even with a missing wing if you've got the skills.

SANDBOX MODE
Use all available parts to build airplanes with no restrictions. The sky is the limit. Literally.

CHALLENGES
Climb into the cockpit of one of your custom aircraft and see how it does in the challenges. Land on aircraft carriers, dodge surface-to-air missiles, race through courses, and so much more.

EDUCATIONAL
Tutorials will help players learn the basics of real airplane design and the considerations that need to be taken when airplanes are made.

In this exciting mobile game, you will become a legendary agent and embark on a secret operation codenamed "zero". Your mission is to sneak into the enemy's aircraft base and destroy all enemy aircraft. You will face many threats alone, but fortunately, you have a support aircraft to provide you with airdrop supplies.

The gameplay of the game is simple but challenging. You will control the agent to move left and right on the runway of the aircraft base to avoid the attacks of enemy aircraft and the falling missiles. The top of the screen is the flight area of ​​​​the enemy aircraft, and they will continue to fire missiles at you in an attempt to shoot you down. You need to stay alert at all times to avoid these deadly threats.

By clicking on the screen, you can fire into the sky and destroy enemy aircraft. There is also a "continuous shooting mode" in the game. After turning it on, you can continue to fire into the air and eliminate the enemy more efficiently. But be careful, once the enemy's missiles fall to the ground, they will cause great damage to you. You only have 3 chances to be hit. Once this number is exceeded, the game will end.

During the battle, the support aircraft will regularly drop airdrops for you. These airdrops contain a variety of useful props, such as ammunition boxes for replenishing bullets, medical kits for restoring health, and upgrade props for strengthening missiles. Proper use of these airdrop props will help you gain an advantage in battle.

As the game progresses, as long as you can hold on longer, you will get additional upgrade opportunities. Every upgrade will make you stronger, whether it is improving firepower, increasing health, or unlocking more powerful props, which can make you more confident when facing the enemy. The longer you hold on, the greater the benefits you will get. The ultimate goal is to defend yourself for as long as possible and destroy more enemy aircraft.

This is a mini casual game that can start an exciting agent journey anytime, anywhere. Simple and easy-to-use operations, coupled with challenging gameplay, allow you to experience the thrill of exciting battles in fragmented time.

In a desolate wilderness, the atmosphere is tense. You are standing in an open area, and suddenly, a group of ferocious wolves surround you from all directions. Their eyes are flashing with greed, and they are approaching you step by step. At this critical moment, you must pick up the gun in your hand, react quickly, repel these monsters, and protect your life. This is a tense and exciting battle, and also a simple and relaxing casual mini game.

### Gameplay

#### Click the screen to fire
The operation of the game is very simple. You only need to click the screen to control the character to shoot at the monster. The crosshairs on the screen will automatically aim at the approaching wolf. You only need to click the screen at the right time to fire bullets and repel the monster. This simple and intuitive operation method allows players to easily get started and quickly get into the game without complicated tutorials.

#### Dynamic aiming and reaction
Although the operation of the game is simple, the actions of the monsters are full of uncertainty. The wolves will attack you from different directions and angles. You need to stay alert at all times, react quickly, and click the screen accurately to effectively repel them. As the game progresses, the number of monsters will gradually increase, and their actions will become more cunning and rapid, which requires players to constantly improve their reaction speed and aiming accuracy.

#### Easy restart, continuous challenge
The game has a very fast pace. Once surrounded or hit by monsters, the game will end. But don't worry, the game provides an easy restart mechanism. You can restart the game with just a click and get back into this exciting battle. This fast restart mechanism allows players to try multiple times in a short period of time, constantly challenge their limits, and easily get the joy of the game.

#### Unique and interesting painting style
The game uses a unique art style. Although the picture is simple, it is full of fun and tension. The image design of the monsters is both scary and interesting, allowing players to feel a hint of humor in the tense battle. The scene design of the game is also very rich. From the barren wilderness to the abandoned town, each scene has its own unique atmosphere, making players feel as if they are in a real combat environment.

#### Endless challenges and fun
Every game is a new challenge. The action mode and number of monsters will be different, which requires players to constantly adjust their strategies and reactions. As the game progresses, you can also unlock new weapons and props to improve your combat effectiveness and better deal with more powerful monsters. This endless challenge and constantly improving gameplay allows players to immerse themselves in the game for a long time and enjoy the fun of shooting.

In this exciting battle, you will be surrounded by various monsters, but with your courage and wisdom, you will be able to repel them and win. Come join this battle, experience simple and easy gameplay, and enjoy endless challenges and fun!

You will become a brave guardian and embark on an adventure to a shrine surrounded by monsters to help the Onmyoji dispel evil and liberate the trapped monster girl.

The game adopts the classic horizontal version of the game. The character you control holds a weapon and stands in the center of the screen, advancing through the various scenes of the shrine as you operate. The road ahead is full of monsters that are malicious to you. They are lurking in the shadows or flying in the air, ready to attack you at any time. You need to keep firing bullets to repel these monsters and protect your way forward.

In the process of moving forward, you can collect gold coins and various props floating in the air by controlling the character to jump upwards. Gold coins are an important resource in the game, which can be used to unlock more powerful weapons and upgrade your equipment. Props can provide you with immediate help, such as increasing the number of bullets, increasing the power of weapons, and obtaining a short invincible state. Reasonable use of these props will make you more calm when facing powerful monsters.

As you continue to defeat monsters, the distance you travel will become longer and longer, and every corner of the shrine will be gradually liberated by you. Each level has a different scene setting, from the ancient shrine courtyard to the deep woods, to the mysterious basement, each scene has unique monsters and challenges waiting for you. You need to flexibly control the character, dodge the monster's attacks, and accurately fire bullets to eliminate the enemy.

us.description:
Become a Legend! Capture over 2000 Animated Monsters and Duel in Real-Time PvP!

Form your team and battle for victory! Capture, train, and evolve to become the champion in one of the biggest monster battling RPGs!

Neo Monsters is an addictive strategy RPG that features epic 4v4 battles between two teams of up to 16 monsters. The unique turn-based battle system allows you to come up with powerful chain strategies by combining hundreds of abilities. Hunt down the strongest monsters and harness their power, then take the battle online to dominate in exciting PvP battles and leagues! Are you ready to take the challenge?

▶Features:
●  Build your Monster Collection
• Capture and evolve over 1000 fully animated monsters!
• Train your monsters and unleash their deadly potential.
• Collect evolution ingredients to create the ultimate power!

●  Form a Battle Strategy
• Build the ultimate team of up to 16 monsters.
• Defeat your opponents in epic turn-based 4v4 battles!
• Create devastating combinations from hundreds of abilities.

●  Become the Champion
• Conquer six Leagues and take on the Grand Champion in 60+ hours of adventure!
• Explore multiple islands and dungeons on your journey.
• Follow the story to uncover the truth behind your late uncle’s atrocity.

●  Take the Battle Online
• Duel players from around the world in PvP leagues!
• Complete 100+ online missions.
• Take on weekly updated events to unlock big rewards.

Follow us on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/NeoMonstersOfficial/
Join the Neo Monsters community:
http://www.neomonstersforum.com/

neomonsupport.gameplay@zigzagame.net

https://www.zigzagame.com/terms/

tr.description:
Apple’s App of the Year with over 15 million downloads and 200,000 5-star ratings globally, Day One has reinvented journaling letting you record your life as you live it. Securely save audio, video, photos, notes, and more in the world’s most trusted digital journal. 

“Day One creates something so rare it feels almost sacred: A completely private digital space.” – New York Times

“Day One makes keeping a journal delightfully easy.” – Wired

“This superb journaling app remains pleasant to behold, easy to use, and a tough act for any rival to follow.” – Macworld

WHY DAY ONE?

Day One is the original journal app and a decade of updates and feature additions make it the most private, trusted, and easiest-to-use journaling platform in the world. 

SIMPLE TO USE, EASY TO LOVE

• Beautiful, award-winning design
• Unlimited text entries 
• Unlimited photos and videos*
• Powerful rich text formatting with markdown
• Different journals for every aspect of your life*

PRIVATE AND SECURE 

• Automatic backups keep your journal entries safe
• End-to-end encryption, which is a fancy way of saying your entries are 100% private
• Journal entries stay secure with passcode or TouchID
• Export options (pdf, plain text, JSON, etc.) ensure your entries always stay yours

FORM A HABIT & STAY CONSISTENT 

• Programmable reminder notifications
• Unique, daily journal prompts help eliminate writer’s cramp 
• Customizable templates save time and add organization to entries
• Today view provides a summary of where you’ve been and what you’ve done

JOURNAL FROM WHEREVER, WHENEVER

• Cross-platform apps available on iPhone, Apple Watch, iPad, and Mac 
• The ability to email entries straight to your journal

BUILT FOR REMINISCING

• On This Day feature allows you to revisit past memories
• Tags, favorites, and search filters make it easy to find what you’re looking for
• Map view quickly shows all the places you’ve journaled from

*Day One is FREE to use forever with unlimited entries. Additional features, including unlimited photos, videos, and sync are available with a Day One Premium membership. Start a free trial today.

tr.description:
Build airplanes by snapping parts together, designing wing sections, and attaching engines. At any time, you can strap yourself into the cockpit and see how it flies with realistic physics. If you're not in the mood for building, over 250,000 airplanes are available to download for free.

BUILD AIRPLANES
You have the tools you'll need to bring any airplane to life. Snap parts together to build your airplane's body. Place engines to add thrust. Design and attach wings and then strap yourself into the cockpit and see how it flies. 

DOWNLOAD AIRPLANES
Over 250,000 airplanes are available to download for free from SimplePlanes.com. Find anything from old WW2 bombers to next-generation fighters to sci-fi spacecraft. You can upload your own airplanes and rise through the ranks from a bronze builder to a gold level builder.

DYNAMIC FLIGHT MODEL
Flight simulation at its finest. Every little change you make in the designer impacts how the airplane flies. Weight distribution, thrust, lift, and drag are all calculated continuously while flying. Parts can break off in spectacular fashion while flying due to over-stress or by hitting something. The fun won't stop there though. You can keep on flying even with a missing wing if you've got the skills.

SANDBOX MODE
Use all available parts to build airplanes with no restrictions. The sky is the limit. Literally.

CHALLENGES
Climb into the cockpit of one of your custom aircraft and see how it does in the challenges. Land on aircraft carriers, dodge surface-to-air missiles, race through courses, and so much more.

EDUCATIONAL
Tutorials will help players learn the basics of real airplane design and the considerations that need to be taken when airplanes are made.

tr.description:
Foggy streets, dark secrets, and a hidden story at every corner.

Case No: 1937 is a choice-based detective game that immerses you in the magical yet dangerous atmosphere of the past. In this interactive experience, you step into the shoes of master detective Refik Bey and chase unsolved cases throughout Istanbul.

Every decision alters the course of events. Sometimes a conversation with a suspect, other times a simple clue can lead you to a completely different ending. You can replay the same story in different ways, uncover hidden endings, and explore branching narratives to shed light on Istanbul’s shadowy history.

Are you ready to solve your first case as Refik Bey?

In this exciting mobile game, you will become a legendary agent and embark on a secret operation codenamed "zero". Your mission is to sneak into the enemy's aircraft base and destroy all enemy aircraft. You will face many threats alone, but fortunately, you have a support aircraft to provide you with airdrop supplies.

The gameplay of the game is simple but challenging. You will control the agent to move left and right on the runway of the aircraft base to avoid the attacks of enemy aircraft and the falling missiles. The top of the screen is the flight area of ​​​​the enemy aircraft, and they will continue to fire missiles at you in an attempt to shoot you down. You need to stay alert at all times to avoid these deadly threats.

By clicking on the screen, you can fire into the sky and destroy enemy aircraft. There is also a "continuous shooting mode" in the game. After turning it on, you can continue to fire into the air and eliminate the enemy more efficiently. But be careful, once the enemy's missiles fall to the ground, they will cause great damage to you. You only have 3 chances to be hit. Once this number is exceeded, the game will end.

During the battle, the support aircraft will regularly drop airdrops for you. These airdrops contain a variety of useful props, such as ammunition boxes for replenishing bullets, medical kits for restoring health, and upgrade props for strengthening missiles. Proper use of these airdrop props will help you gain an advantage in battle.

As the game progresses, as long as you can hold on longer, you will get additional upgrade opportunities. Every upgrade will make you stronger, whether it is improving firepower, increasing health, or unlocking more powerful props, which can make you more confident when facing the enemy. The longer you hold on, the greater the benefits you will get. The ultimate goal is to defend yourself for as long as possible and destroy more enemy aircraft.

This is a mini casual game that can start an exciting agent journey anytime, anywhere. Simple and easy-to-use operations, coupled with challenging gameplay, allow you to experience the thrill of exciting battles in fragmented time.

In a desolate wilderness, the atmosphere is tense. You are standing in an open area, and suddenly, a group of ferocious wolves surround you from all directions. Their eyes are flashing with greed, and they are approaching you step by step. At this critical moment, you must pick up the gun in your hand, react quickly, repel these monsters, and protect your life. This is a tense and exciting battle, and also a simple and relaxing casual mini game.

### Gameplay

#### Click the screen to fire
The operation of the game is very simple. You only need to click the screen to control the character to shoot at the monster. The crosshairs on the screen will automatically aim at the approaching wolf. You only need to click the screen at the right time to fire bullets and repel the monster. This simple and intuitive operation method allows players to easily get started and quickly get into the game without complicated tutorials.

#### Dynamic aiming and reaction
Although the operation of the game is simple, the actions of the monsters are full of uncertainty. The wolves will attack you from different directions and angles. You need to stay alert at all times, react quickly, and click the screen accurately to effectively repel them. As the game progresses, the number of monsters will gradually increase, and their actions will become more cunning and rapid, which requires players to constantly improve their reaction speed and aiming accuracy.

#### Easy restart, continuous challenge
The game has a very fast pace. Once surrounded or hit by monsters, the game will end. But don't worry, the game provides an easy restart mechanism. You can restart the game with just a click and get back into this exciting battle. This fast restart mechanism allows players to try multiple times in a short period of time, constantly challenge their limits, and easily get the joy of the game.

#### Unique and interesting painting style
The game uses a unique art style. Although the picture is simple, it is full of fun and tension. The image design of the monsters is both scary and interesting, allowing players to feel a hint of humor in the tense battle. The scene design of the game is also very rich. From the barren wilderness to the abandoned town, each scene has its own unique atmosphere, making players feel as if they are in a real combat environment.

#### Endless challenges and fun
Every game is a new challenge. The action mode and number of monsters will be different, which requires players to constantly adjust their strategies and reactions. As the game progresses, you can also unlock new weapons and props to improve your combat effectiveness and better deal with more powerful monsters. This endless challenge and constantly improving gameplay allows players to immerse themselves in the game for a long time and enjoy the fun of shooting.

In this exciting battle, you will be surrounded by various monsters, but with your courage and wisdom, you will be able to repel them and win. Come join this battle, experience simple and easy gameplay, and enjoy endless challenges and fun!

You will become a brave guardian and embark on an adventure to a shrine surrounded by monsters to help the Onmyoji dispel evil and liberate the trapped monster girl.

The game adopts the classic horizontal version of the game. The character you control holds a weapon and stands in the center of the screen, advancing through the various scenes of the shrine as you operate. The road ahead is full of monsters that are malicious to you. They are lurking in the shadows or flying in the air, ready to attack you at any time. You need to keep firing bullets to repel these monsters and protect your way forward.

In the process of moving forward, you can collect gold coins and various props floating in the air by controlling the character to jump upwards. Gold coins are an important resource in the game, which can be used to unlock more powerful weapons and upgrade your equipment. Props can provide you with immediate help, such as increasing the number of bullets, increasing the power of weapons, and obtaining a short invincible state. Reasonable use of these props will make you more calm when facing powerful monsters.

As you continue to defeat monsters, the distance you travel will become longer and longer, and every corner of the shrine will be gradually liberated by you. Each level has a different scene setting, from the ancient shrine courtyard to the deep woods, to the mysterious basement, each scene has unique monsters and challenges waiting for you. You need to flexibly control the character, dodge the monster's attacks, and accurately fire bullets to eliminate the enemy.

tr.description:
Become a Legend! Capture over 2000 Animated Monsters and Duel in Real-Time PvP!

Form your team and battle for victory! Capture, train, and evolve to become the champion in one of the biggest monster battling RPGs!

Neo Monsters is an addictive strategy RPG that features epic 4v4 battles between two teams of up to 16 monsters. The unique turn-based battle system allows you to come up with powerful chain strategies by combining hundreds of abilities. Hunt down the strongest monsters and harness their power, then take the battle online to dominate in exciting PvP battles and leagues! Are you ready to take the challenge?

▶Features:
●  Build your Monster Collection
• Capture and evolve over 1000 fully animated monsters!
• Train your monsters and unleash their deadly potential.
• Collect evolution ingredients to create the ultimate power!

●  Form a Battle Strategy
• Build the ultimate team of up to 16 monsters.
• Defeat your opponents in epic turn-based 4v4 battles!
• Create devastating combinations from hundreds of abilities.

●  Become the Champion
• Conquer six Leagues and take on the Grand Champion in 60+ hours of adventure!
• Explore multiple islands and dungeons on your journey.
• Follow the story to uncover the truth behind your late uncle’s atrocity.

●  Take the Battle Online
• Duel players from around the world in PvP leagues!
• Complete 100+ online missions.
• Take on weekly updated events to unlock big rewards.
